      • sql

        public boolean sql(java.lang.String sql,
          int callerId)
        Universal sql query to database
        Parameters:
        sql - - sql query
        callerId - - id who initialize sql query If query is update db (INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE) returned int value (ResultSet.getInt(1)) may be: > 0 - count of updated rows or query no take effect or error.
